title: Free market economic policies and China

content.prompt:
Some historians have argued that at the end of the twentieth century, many governments encouraged free-market economic policies.

Which of the following best supports this argument?

choices.label: The election of presidents who represented workersâ€™ parties in Venezuela and Brazil
The creation of a legal framework for privatization of previously state-owned enterprises in China
The production of oil in Iran by the government-owned National Iranian Oil Company
The expansion of the federal Medicare and Medicaid programs in the United States

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
